meanings.sent1: The mellific bees worked hard to fill the hive with honey.
meanings.sent2: The mellific flowers attracted many bees with their sweet nectar.
meanings.sent3: The mellific bees threw a honey party in the hive.
meanings.sent4: Her mellific voice was like a soothing melody to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The mellific aroma of fresh honey filled the room.

meanings.definition: Sweet or honey-like in taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The mellific dessert left a delightful taste in her mouth.
meanings.sent2: The mellific scent of flowers wafted through the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mellific cake was so sweet, it made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mellific laughter echoed in the room like music.
meanings.sent5: The mellific flavor of the honey was unmatched by any other.
